trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bolivar
There were no other sightings in Bolivar on or around
divs: sighting detailsagain, i took the dogs out and saw another object, this one was about 3-4th magnitude when it blinked,which it did several times for about ten minutes. it appeared to be very high up, stationary,and blinked about once a minute. i went to get my fiance,she saw it,but didnt stay out long because it was too cold for her.i couldnt see it unless it blinked.it was between 3-5 degrees southeast of betelgeuse in the constellation of orion. it couldve been a satellite, but im not sure.the dogs were barking profusely (including my dogs and dogs in the distance) which isnt out of the norm .even though this event is much smaller compared to the last recent one, i felt the need to report it. i look at the sky alot and always have. i also have studied astronomy almost all my life and this is a little out of the ordinary. i was also wondering if *(name deleted--cms\sg) in springfield mo. received my information that i returned to him in email. thx again,,,,,
